# ServiceHttpHandlerSettings.DisableChunkedTransfer property

True to disable chunked transfer encoding (default false).

```csharp
public bool DisableChunkedTransfer { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

If true, the response is serialized into memory before sending it to the client.
